lines: 1. Nche nomwan' oo kwandangeirie,Many'obwanchani bwao;Ko nindigetie as'okwegena,Kong'uswa ang'e n' Aye.
Ng'usa ang'e (ang'e)ang' Omonene,Ase gwatokwerete;Ng'usa ang'e, ang'e,ang'Omonene,Nimbe naye botambe.
2. Onchene bono as' emeremo,'S' okobua kw'obuya;Nkogaramer, erio ngosemerie,Kogania kob' as'ore.
3. Mogoko bw'eng'aki er'enk as' ore,As 'ekerogo kiao;'Kero nkogosaba Nyasae One,Nkwana bun' omosani.
4. N'obwanchani obonge nche ntamanye,Goika ng'amboke nyancha;Noreo mogoko nche ntamanye,Goika ntimok 'as'ore.
